name: io.github.vitali87/code-graph-rag
title: Code-Graph-RAG
description: Graph-based RAG system for multi-language codebases. Parse, index, query, and edit code using knowledge graphs and natural language.

environmentVariables.name: ORCHESTRATOR_PROVIDER
environmentVariables.description: LLM provider for the orchestrator agent (openai, anthropic, google, azure, cohere, ollama)

environmentVariables.name: ORCHESTRATOR_MODEL
environmentVariables.description: Model name for the orchestrator agent

environmentVariables.name: ORCHESTRATOR_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: API key for the orchestrator LLM provider

environmentVariables.name: CYPHER_PROVIDER
environmentVariables.description: LLM provider for Cypher query generation (openai, anthropic, google, azure, cohere, ollama)

environmentVariables.name: CYPHER_MODEL
environmentVariables.description: Model name for Cypher query generation

environmentVariables.name: CYPHER_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: API key for the Cypher LLM provider

environmentVariables.name: TARGET_REPO_PATH
environmentVariables.description: Path to the repository to analyze (auto-detected from working directory if not set)
